I called technical support and they provide excellent support.  No only did they configure the multi-camera feature for me but they set up my remote access as well. I couldn't have expected better or more prompt service from any company!  I would by a FOSCAM product any day!  Derrick was excellent with the support he provided!!!

Reviews.Title: Zero support for linux :(
Reviews.Author: Daniel Cardenas
Reviews.Content: Wow I can't believe they don't support Linux.  What is wrong with these people?  Stop adding fancy features and get back to basics and have some kind of minimal web support for linux please.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful technical support. Helped set up all cameras
Reviews.Author: Murray Shaw
Reviews.Content: Wonderful technical support. Helped set up all camerasCameras are Wonderful better then my DVR cameras and zoom feature is fantastic

Reviews.Title: Foscam WF19821
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: Calvin did a great did on helping me set up the camera, it looks like a very good picture and will update as I use it more.

Reviews.Title: CAMERA AND THE SUPPORT
Reviews.Author: Seematty
Reviews.Content: Calvin, Did very good service.  We have liked the camera in our place.  We are trying to use in other places also.He is very knowledgable.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Tech support
Reviews.Author: Lacy Largent
Reviews.Content: I purchased a Foscam FI8910W camera and had difficulty working with Windows 7 and IE--never could get connected.  So, I changed my default browser to CHROME and got connected right away!  I was then able to follow the directions for remote access up until a certain point where I just gave up and called Foscam Tech Support and spoke with Calvin and an associate of his.  They were both very helpful and solved all my issues by remotely getting into my computer and setting things up right.I let Calvin know how I wanted to use my iPhone to view the camera and he typed all those instructions into Notepad on my computer and I was able to download the Foscam Pro Ap and view the camera!  All done.  I should have called Calvin at Foscam Tech Support hours ago!Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Rico
Reviews.Content: Called the Foscam Customer service. Spoke w/ Calvin and he's been very helpful w/ assisting me w/ setting up my port forwarding. I'm now able to access my IP cam anywere. Thanks Calvin. Excellent job!!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent product and superb service from IT
Reviews.Author: Howard Li
Reviews.Content: The camera was easy to set up. And Calvin was extremely helpful making sure everything worked between my computer and iPhone - remotely.The camera is high quality picture and easy to use from different angles from side to side, and up to down. Love it.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Technical Support
Reviews.Author: Kari C
Reviews.Content: I needed help setting up my wireless camera systems. Ralph M helped me all the way. The quality of the cameras is superb. We plan to purchase a few more. I highly recommend Foscam

Reviews.Title: foscam
Reviews.Author: leah
Reviews.Content: great tech support got camera up running quickly and three cameras working good quality of video is good and motor is quiet. using wirelessly smoothly

Reviews.Title: Technical Support
Reviews.Author: Brandon Little
Reviews.Content: Could not view camera outside of home which is the reason we have this camera. We like the picture quality and the customer support. I highly recommend foscam.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Tech Support
Reviews.Author: Mary Lou Ferro
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Foscam camera and its the second one that I bought. I love the ease of use and the quality of the lens ( even at night). I had a little trouble connecting it to be wireless and I called up the support team and they got me through the set up in no time!! This is your go to wireless camera for all your needs!

Reviews.Title: technical support
Reviews.Author: Steven
Reviews.Content: Contacted for remote setup up.  Foscam camera worked great out of the box and remote set up was very easy.  VEry happy with the purchase and recommend to all.  Remote support was very helpful and took less than 10 minutes!

Reviews.Title: Great job with the technical support!
Reviews.Author: Heather
Reviews.Content: Needed assistance to set up the camera remotely to view over the internet and over the phone. The camera has great picture quality and it is helpful that you can access it remotely using my iphone. The technical support that I recevied was very helpful. I fully reccomend Foscam.
